home.title: Vieweather
home.description: Get the latest 5-day weather forecast for your city

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the location you are looking for does not exist

searchForm.ariaLabel: Search Weather for a City or ZIP Code

tooltip.cityTooltipText: Type the city name, optionally followed by the country code (e.g., 'Paris' or 'Paris,FR').
tooltip.cityUSStateTooltipText: For US cities, you may optionally include the state. If you include the state, the country code is also required (e.g., 'Arlington,TX,US').
tooltip.zipTooltipText: Enter the ZIP code followed by the country code (e.g., '90210,US').
